00010 /* File:    cc1000.h                                                                             */

00013 /* which you could find at the Berkeley tinyOS website                                           */

00015 /* Author:         huid@colorado.edu                                                             */

00073 /* Define each pin for the CC1000 */
00074 
00075 // The bit definitions in the MAIN register
00076 #define CC1000_RXTX             7
00077 #define CC1000_F_REG            6
00078 #define CC1000_RX_PD            5
00079 #define CC1000_TX_PD            4
00080 #define CC1000_FS_PD            3
00081 #define CC1000_CORE_PD          2
00082 #define CC1000_BIAS_PD          1
00083 #define CC1000_RESET_N          0
00084 
00085 
00086 // The bit definitions in the CURRENT register
00087 //CURRENT[7-4],  control of current in VCO core for TX and RX
00088 #define CC1000_VCO_CURRENT      4
00089 //control of current in VCO buffer for LO drive
00090 #define CC1000_LO_DRIVE         2
00091 //control of current in VCO buffer for PA
00092 #define CC1000_PA_DRIVE         0
00093 
00094 // The bit definitions in the FRONT_END register
00095 #define CC1000_BUF_CURRENT      5
00096 #define CC1000_LNA_CURRENT      3
00097 #define CC1000_IF_RSSI          1
00098 #define CC1000_XOSC_BYPASS      0
00099 
00100 // The bit definitions in the PA_POW register
00101 #define CC1000_PA_HIGHPOWER     4
00102 #define CC1000_PA_LOWPOWER      0
00103 
00104 // The bit definitions in the PLL register
00105 #define CC1000_EXT_FILTER       7
00106 #define CC1000_REFDIV           3
00107 #define CC1000_ALARM_DISABLE    2
00108 #define CC1000_ALARM_H          1
00109 #define CC1000_ALARM_L          0
00110 
00111 // The Bit Definitions in the LOCK register
00112 #define CC1000_LOCK_SELECT      4
00113 #define CC1000_PLL_LOCK_ACCURACY        3
00114 #define CC1000_PLL_LOCK_LENGTH  2
00115 #define CC1000_LOCK_INSTANT     1
00116 #define CC1000_LOCK_CONTINUOUS  0
00117 
00118 // Bit Definitions in the CAL register 
00119 #define CC1000_CAL_START        7
00120 #define CC1000_CAL_DUAL         6
00121 #define CC1000_CAL_WAIT         5
00122 #define CC1000_CAL_CURRENT      4
00123 #define CC1000_CAL_COMPLETE     3
00124 #define CC1000_CAL_ITERATE      0  //3 bits
00125 
00126 // Bit definitions in the MODEM2 register
00127 #define CC1000_PEAKDETECT               7 
00128 #define CC1000_PEAK_LEVEL_OFFSET        0 //7 bits
00129 
00130 // Bit Definitions in MODEM1 Register 
00131 #define CC1000_MLIMIT           5
00132 #define CC1000_LOCK_AVG_IN      4
00133 #define CC1000_LOCK_AVG_MODE    3
00134 #define CC1000_SETTLING         1
00135 #define CC1000_MODEM_RESET_N    0
00136 
00137 // Bit Definitions in  MODEM0 Register 
00138 #define CC1000_BAUDRATE         4
00139 #define CC1000_DATA_FORMAT      2
00140 #define CC1000_XOSC_FREQ        0
00141 
00142 // Bit Definitions in MATCH Register 
00143 #define CC1000_RX_MATCH         4
00144 #define CC1000_TX_MATCH         0
00145 
00146 // Bit Definitions in FSCTLR Register 
00147 #define CC1000_DITHER1          3
00148 #define CC1000_DITHER0          2
00149 #define CC1000_SHAPE            1
00150 #define CC1000_FS_RESET_N       0
00151 
00152 // Bit Definitions in PRESCALER Register 
00153 #define CC1000_PRE_SWING                6
00154 #define CC1000_PRE_CURRENT      4
00155 #define CC1000_IF_INPUT         3
00156 #define CC1000_IF_FRONT         2
00157 
00158 // Bit Definitions in TEST6 Register 
00159 #define CC1000_LOOPFILTER_TP1   7
00160 #define CC1000_LOOPFILTER_TP2   6
00161 #define CC1000_CHP_OVERRIDE     5
00162 #define CC1000_CHP_CO           0
00163 
00164 // Bit Definitions in TEST5 Register 
00165 #define CC1000_CHP_DISALBE      5
00166 #define CC1000_VCO_OVERRIDE     4
00167 #define CC1000_VCO_AO           0
00168 
00169 // Bit Definitions in TEST3 Register 
00170 #define CC1000_BREAK_LOOP               4
00171 #define CC1000_CAL_DAC_OPEN     0
00172 
00173 // Bit Definitons in TEST2 Register 
00174 #define CC1000_CHP_CURRENT     0
00175 
00176 // Bit Definitons in TEST1 Register 
00177 #define CC1000_CAL_DAC        0
00178 
00179 // Bit Definitons in TEST0 
00180 #define CC1000_VCO_ARRAY 0
00181 
00182 // The Number of the total frequencies available to use
00183 #define FREQS_NUM 0x1e
00184

00262 // Define the transmission speed for the radios 
00263 #define BAUD_0_6_K 0x07     //0.6 KBaud
00264 #define BAUD_1_2_K 0x17     //1.2 KBaud
00265 #define BAUD_2_4_K 0x27     //2.4 KBaud
00266 #define BAUD_4_8_K 0x37
00267 #define BAUD_9_6_K 0x47
00268 #define BAUD_19_2_K 0x57
00269 #define BAUD_38_4_K 0x57
00270 
00271 #define BAUD_19_2_K_LOWER_TEST4 0x25

00275 #define CONFIG_PORT      PORTC
00276 #define CONFIG_PORT_DIR  DDRC
00277 #define CONFIG_PORT_PIN  PINC
00278 #define PALE             3
00279 #define PDATA            2
00280 #define PCLK             1
00281 #elif defined(PLATFORM_MICA2)
00282 #define CONFIG_PORT      PORTD
00283 #define CONFIG_PORT_DIR  DDRD
00284 #define CONFIG_PORT_PIN  PIND
00285 #define PALE             4
00286 #define PDATA            7
00287 #define PCLK             6
00288 #elif defined(PLATFORM_MICA2DOT)
00289 #define CONFIG_PORT      PORTD
00290 #define CONFIG_PORT_DIR  DDRD
00291 #define CONFIG_PORT_PIN  PIND
00292 #define PALE             5
00293 #define PDATA            7
00294 #define PCLK             6
00295 #else
00296 #error "Radio port/pins undefined"
